casebody.data:
C. Gray Bolton, et al., Appellants v. William Schriever, et al., Respondents. Decided December 15, 1891. Appeal from order denying motion to vacate order for extra allowance and to have costs of defendants retaxed. Smith & Perkins, attorneys, and Edward C. Perkins of counsel^ for appellants. Johnston & Johnston, for respondents.

Before Freedman, P. J., and McAdam, J.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs.
